Module com.example.organizer
Package com.bookclub.service

Class RSVPService

java.lang.Object
com.bookclub.service.RSVPService
public class RSVPService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing RSVP actions related to events and users. Provides functionalities to retrieve and save RSVP information.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static RSVPService getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of RSVPService.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of RSVPService.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if RSVPService is not initialized.

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(com.bookclub.iao.IRSVPAO rsvpAO, com.bookclub.iao.IUserAO userAO)
      Initializes the RSVPService with the necessary data access objects. Required to be called before operations.
      Parameters:
      rsvpAO - The data access object for RSVP operations.
      userAO - The data access object for User operations.

    • getEventRSVPUsernames

      public List<String> getEventRSVPUsernames(Event event)
      Retrieves a list of usernames of users who have RSVP'd to a given event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which to retrieve the RSVP usernames.
      Returns:
      A list of usernames of users who have RSVP'd to the event.

    • getRSVP

      public RSVP getRSVP(Event event, User user)
      Retrieves the RSVP for a specific event and user.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to check for the user's RSVP.
      user - The user whose RSVP is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      The RSVP object if found, or null if not found.

    • saveRSVP

      public void saveRSVP(Event event, User user, RSVP.RSVPStatus status)
      Saves the RSVP status for a user related to a specific event. If the user has already RSVP'd, their status is updated; otherwise, a new RSVP is created.
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which the user is RSVP'ing.
      user - The user who is RSVP'ing.
      status - The RSVP status (ACCEPTED, MAYBE, DECLINED, PENDING).
